attributes.action: Impose minimum sentences for child abuse and rape
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many time do we hear about a horific crime of child abuse or rape resulting in too low a sentence being given out or the person convicted receiving an automatic reduction in sentance for pleading guilty.
it is difficult enough to get the conviction in the first place, but to do so and then find out that the sentence is a joke makes it less likey that prosecution will take place in the first place.
I beleive that Minimum sentences for these horific crime would be supported by the majority.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
